title: 分享我的歌单前10首歌
author: Tom_cat
txt_content:
以下全部歌曲在网易云音乐都可以搜索到
No.1    Victor Lin - Made in 2014 (Year-end Mashup featuring 45 Pop Songs)
No.2    Isosine - Nonstop Pop 2012
No.3    DJ Earworm - United State of Pop 2014 (Do What You Wanna Do)
No.4    Owl City - The Saltwater Room
No.5    The Popest - Don't Know What You Mean (2015年下半年25首欧美金曲年度混音)
No.6    DJ Earworm - United State of Pop 2012 (Shine Brighter)
No.7    Anthem Lights - Best of 2015 Style  What Do You Mean  Uptown Funk  Love Me Like You Do  Watch Me  See You Again
No.8    T10MO - HITS OF 2015
No.9    DJ Earworm - United State of Pop 2016 (Into Pieces)
No.10  Various Artists -  2014 Best of Dance Music Launchpad Mashup 67 Songs
除了第4首，其他都是欧美流行音乐串烧歌曲，希望大家会喜欢~
